items.content_html: A lightweight browser extension that enhances your Twitch viewing experience by providing instant game information for streams you're watching. When browsing Twitch, GameScanner displays detailed information about the current game being streamed, including prices across different platforms, store links, and key details - all without leaving Twitch.

When browsing Twitch, GameScanner displays detailed information about the current game being streamed, including prices across different platforms, store links, and key details - all without leaving Twitch.

items.content_html: A lightweight Chrome extension that detects time strings in Microsoft Teams and Outlook web applications (e.g., "11 PM IST", "11:00 PM IST", etc.) and converts them from their source timezone to a target timezone of your choice.
items.title: rajasuryars/Universal-Timezone-Converter-for-Teams-and-Outlook: A lightweight Chrome extension that detects time strings in Microsoft Teams and Outlook web applications (e.g., "11 PM IST", "11:00 PM IST", etc.) and converts them from their source timezone to a target timezone of your choice.
